SELECT pgs.id, pgs.goods_id, pgs.no, pgs.barcode, pgs.cost_price, pgs.sale_price, pgs.status, pgs.spec_name, pgs.spec_value,
pw.name AS warehouse_name,
(SELECT coalesce(sum(CASE ps.type WHEN 'IN' THEN ps.num WHEN 'OUT' THEN -ps.num ELSE 0 END), 0) FROM psi_stock ps WHERE ps.goods_id = pgs.goods_id AND ps.sku_id = pgs.id) AS warehouse_num, pg.name AS goods_name, pg.pic_urls AS pic_urls, pu.name AS unit_name, pc.name AS catalog_name FROM psi_stock ps LEFT JOIN psi_goods pg ON pg.id = ps.goods_id LEFT JOIN psi_catalog pc ON pc.id = pg.catalog_id LEFT JOIN psi_unit pu ON pu.id = pg.unit_id LEFT JOIN psi_goods_sku pgs ON ps.goods_id = pgs.goods_id AND ps.sku_id = pgs.id
LEFT JOIN psi_warehouse pw ON pw.id = ps.warehouse_id
mapper.select: group by pgs.id, pgs.goods_id, pgs.no, pgs.barcode, pgs.cost_price, pgs.sale_price, pgs.status, pgs.spec_name, pgs.spec_value,pw.name, pg.name, pg.pic_urls, pu.name, pc.name
group by pgs.id, pgs.goods_id, pgs.no, pgs.barcode, pgs.cost_price, pgs.sale_price, pgs.status, pgs.spec_name, pgs.spec_value,pw.name, pg.name, pg.pic_urls, pu.name, pc.name

select t.id, t.goods_id, t.no, t.barcode, t.cost_price, t.sale_price, t.status, t.spec_name, t.spec_value, pg.name as goods_name, pg.pic_urls as pic_urls, pu.name as unit_name, pc.name as catalog_name from psi_goods_sku t left join psi_goods pg on pg.id = t.goods_id left join psi_catalog pc on pc.id = pg.catalog_id left join psi_unit pu on pu.id = pg.unit_id where t.goods_id = #{goodsId} group by t.id, t.goods_id, t.no, t.barcode, t.cost_price, t.sale_price, t.status, t.spec_name, t.spec_value

select t.id, t.goods_id, t.no, t.barcode, t.cost_price, t.sale_price, t.status, t.spec_name, t.spec_value, pg.name as goods_name, pg.pic_urls as pic_urls, pu.name as unit_name, pc.name as catalog_name from psi_goods_sku t left join psi_goods pg on pg.id = t.goods_id left join psi_catalog pc on pc.id = pg.catalog_id left join psi_unit pu on pu.id = pg.unit_id where t.id = #{id}
